info.caption: Crochet
info.text: A new line as of September 2020, we at Omnique now sell handmade crochet items! From blankets to scarves to wall hangings, our stock ranges from season to season, making the perfect gifts for family and friends all year round!

info.caption: Prints
info.text: Here at Omnique, we have worked hard to create our designs and adorable artwork. Not only do we sell our designs on items, but these are now available as stand alone prints! Whether you want to decorate your wall with postcards, or hang some framed artwork - we have got you covered!

info.caption: Apparel
info.text: We sell t-shirts, hoodies, jackets and bags suitable for adults, children and babies all in our very own cute designs! Made from the greatest materials and with all designs applied by hand, you will not be disappointed with the unique apparel you can get from us at Omnique!

info.caption: Merchandise and Larger Orders
info.text: At Omnique, we have always taken pride in our work with businesses and groups that require personalised merchandise. We do not put prices on our website with regards to this, as we work with our suppliers to cut the cost down for clients as much as possible. This includes, but is not limited to, bulk buy discount. Check out our "Larger Order" page and fill out the form if you have any enquiries or would like to request a quote.
